biotools.summary: COSIFER (COnSensus Interaction Network InFErence Service) is a Python package for the consensus inference of molecular interaction networks. Inference framework for reconstructing networks using a consensus approach between multiple methods and data sources. COSIFER runs multiple selected inference algorithms on your expression data and returns a consensus interaction network.
